p: To calculate the number of ZIKV cases and the IAR, we use the estimate obtained for ρ ( ρ = 0.00061—ratio of reported GBS to symptomatic ZIKV), and denote the ZIKV symptomatic ratio as θ, as before. ρ can be estimated from the model. Then, the number of ZIKV cases equals (the number of reported GBS) ÷ [reported GBS/symptomatic ZIKV] ÷ (ZIKV symptomatic ratio), which is the number of the reported GBS/ ρ/ θ. The IAR equals the number ZIKV cases ÷ the total population in the NE Brazil.
